item.description:
Event Description:  This event is for teens and adults new to sword fighting.  

Bring your friends and learn the basics of foam sword sparring.  Then have a blast sharpening your new skills in our tactical games.  We provide the swords.  You provide the battle cry!  When the night is done and you have vanquished your foes, you get to bring home a FREE Sport Sword DVD which has more lessons and will help you retain your techniques.  

 

Important Info: This  special event is for ages 13 and up.  The value of this package is $55.  The normal cost for this is $25.  However, if you register with the coupon code “SWORDSPECIAL” your cost is only $5 a person. Register early as we will be limiting the number of participants. Pre-registration required.  Call (781) 270-4800 or visit www.guardup.com for more information.  You can also register immediately (because we do have a cap on this event and it is expected to fill up) at www.guardup.net

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Adults & Teens: Special Sword Event â€“ Plus Free DVD - Only $5
